attributes.action: ensure that any planned smoke rooms in any goverment building anywhere will not be allowed
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It has come to my attention that rooms are to be set aside for polititions to smoke in when the new ban takes place in july and also the EU parliment is to do this. This must be stopped and like many other people they should be exposed to the british weather and stand in the open air

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
